title: NDBIB and CT CLSA form strategic partnership
snippet: NDB Investment Bank Ltd. (NDBIB) and CT CLSA Capital Ltd. (CT CLSA) have entered into a Collaboration Agreement to work together in raising capital for Sri Lankan corporates via Equity Initial Public Offerings (IPOs) on the Colombo Stock Exchange.

title: Samsung launches Galaxy S22 Series in Sri Lanka
snippet: Samsung on Wednesday unveiled its most premium flagships -Galaxy S22 Series in Sri Lanka at an exclusive media event. Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G combines the unrivalled power of the Note series and the iconic S-Pen with the pro-grade camera and performance of the S series to set the new standard for premium smartphones.

title: Globally distributed British tech consultancy Codification expands operations into Sri Lanka
snippet: Codification, a globally distributed digital transformation consultancy based in the UK, entered into the Sri Lankan market last year and has accelerated hiring in the country. Having been impressed by the quality and capabilities of the talent Sri Lanka has to offer,

title: Royal Cashews shines with two Golds at NCE National Export Excellence Awards
snippet: Royal Cashews, a Sri Lanka company empowering local cultivators and victorious in local and overseas markets, won the Best Ethically Trading Exporter 2021 NCE Challenge Trophy - Special Award for the first time at the National Export Excellence Awards organised by the National Chamber of Exporters recently.

title: Instant Grocery Delivery App Buyk Files for Bankruptcy After Russian Sanctions
snippet: Rapid grocery delivery app Buyk Corp. filed for bankruptcy on Thursday after fallout from Russia's invasion of Ukraine restricted the startup's access to funding. title: Properties booked weeks in advance by local & global travellers
snippet: Akhil Arora, chief operating officer at Espire Hospitality Group that owns Country Inn Hotels & Resorts, said all the chain's hotels were completely booked to capacity three weeks prior to Holi.

title: Sri Lanka to target Indian investors
snippet: Dispelling all concerns, the Colombo Port City officials are wooing Indian investors in the Sri Lanka project in contest with Dubai, Singapore and Malaysia. title: How Four Powerful Brothers Broke an Island Nation
snippet: The Rajapaksa clan may have defeated the Tamil rebellion, but they've lost control of Sri Lanka's economy after two years of worsening crisis.

title: Looming food shortages is the next 'slow-moving disaster' to hit world
snippet: Food prices are already skyrocketing. Some — a lot — of this comes from inflation caused by runaway government spending over the past two years.

title: Sri Lanka suffering reduced if IMF decision was made earlier: opposition
snippet: Sri Lanka's current economic troubles would have been avoided if a decision has been made to approach the International Monetary Fund earlier and authorities cannot disclaim responsibility, opposition legislator Harsha de Silva said.
